ClassDesc: Notification style for media playback notifications. In the expanded form, @B_android#app#Notification#bigContentView_E@, up to 5 @B_android#app#Notification#Action_E@s specified with @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#addAction_E@ will be shown as icon-only pushbuttons, suitable for transport controls. The Bitmap given to @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setLargeIcon_E@ will be treated as album artwork. Unlike the other styles provided here, MediaStyle can also modify the standard-size @B_android#app#Notification#contentView_E@; by providing action indices to @B_android#app#Notification#MediaStyle#setShowActionsInCompactView_E@ you can promote up to 3 actions to be displayed in the standard view alongside the usual content. Notifications created with MediaStyle will have their category set to @B_android#app#Notification#CATEGORY_TRANSPORT_E@ unless you set a different category using @B_android#app#Notification#Builder#setCategory_E@. Finally, if you attach a @B_android#media#session#MediaSession#Token_E@ using @B_android#app#Notification#MediaStyle#setMediaSession_E@, the System UI can identify this as a notification representing an active media session and respond accordingly (by showing album artwork in the lockscreen, for example).
